item.title: Overflowing dog waste and litter bins with rubbish left at the side, 27th February
item.description:
Walking our dog this morning it was difficult to put his poo in bins. Others had left their dogâ€™s poos at side which we picked up and took to bins in the High Street. Children use this route actress the park to get home as the primary school is close by.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Georges Road, Beckenham, Greater London

item.title: Bin needs emptying, 27th February
item.description:
Hi there, This bin is regularly missed and should be emptied daily. In addition, residents around that streets often create next to this bin a fly-tipping dump - please monitor this bin daily and fine for fly& tipping as required. Best, L

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gurdon Road, Charlton
